src_original: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamiti /
tgt_original: 大德！ 今當為憐愍故施菩薩戒。

src_original: na cirasyedānī me 'kṣayasyāprameyasya niruttarasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya prāptirbhaviṣyatīti /
tgt_original: 「今我已得成就無量無邊無上功德寶藏，當得菩薩所受持戒。

src_original: tena punarvvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvo 'vikṣiptena cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā evaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /  śṛṇu tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /

tgt_original: 「大德諦聽！ 我今從大德乞受菩薩戒、大自在戒、無上戒、無勝戒。
大德於我不重心者，為憐愍故，乞施我戒。

src_original: trirevamadhyeṣya ekāṃsamuttarāṅgaṃ kṛtvādaśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ  bhagavatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛttvā teṣāṃ guṇānāmukhīkṛtya  ghanarasaṃ cetaḥprasādaṃ saṃjanayya nīcairjānumaṇḍalenotkuṭukena vā sthitvā tathāgatapratimāṃ  purataḥ saṃsthāpya saṃpūjya puraskṛtyaivaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 」若彼大德默然聽者，即應還起更整衣服，向十方三世諸佛世尊及住大地諸菩薩等頭面作禮，任己智力讚歎諸佛及諸菩薩所有功德，專念三寶，在佛像前長跪合掌，作如是言： 「大德！ 我今某甲乞受菩薩戒。
